audio_caption: The clip begins with a female speaker, conveying information about where the members of the K-pop group BTS live. She explains that two members bought apartments in Korea and proceeds to talk about the group's living situation, mentioning that they used to share a cramped space. She sets up the topic of where the superstars now "call home", with an upbeat and informative tone. Throughout the audio, there is background music playing, possibly pop music.

The audio begins with a female speaker, speaking with a bright and enthusiastic tone, warning listeners about not showing up at private residences and then introducing BTS, also known as the Bangtan Boys, and their individual members. She apologizes for not being able to pronounce one member's name and asks that BTS Army fans not come at her. The speaker discusses BTS's achievements, including selling over 20 million albums and having a net worth of at least $20 million each. She continues, describing the early days of the band, living together in a small apartment, and upgrading to a multi-million dollar suite as their success increased. She then mentions two members recently buying new luxury apartments. She then introduces herself as Kara the Vampire Slayer and says she is back with another exclusive house tour on Famous Entertainment, checking out where the members of BTS call home.

The clip begins with a female speaker requesting listeners to subscribe and activate notifications for daily video updates. She also mentions her Instagram account and transitions into the main content. A song starts with a laid-back and funky vibe, driven by a prominent bassline.

The audio clip starts with a female voice describing how BTS members RM and Jimin have purchased apartments in a lavish complex, referencing their song "Moving On" with the lyrics "Let's move now to a higher place." Her tone is informative and news-like. This is followed by the presence of background music with a genre/style that cannot be determined based on the given information.

The audio begins with a female speaker discussing "91 Hannam," referring to it as the "Beverly Hills of Korea" and the priciest apartment building in Seoul, situated near the Han River and Namsan Mountain. The speaker sounds informative and enthusiastic. She details the complex's privacy features, including a "four-step verification security system," and amenities such as party rooms, a swimming pool, and a fancy dining lounge with hotel chefs. The audio concludes with the speaker mentioning "much more".

The audio clip begins with a woman speaking in an excited and descriptive tone about RM and Jimin making big purchases in March, spending millions on apartments. She mentions other local celebrities living nearby and describes the apartments' sizes, noting a price difference possibly due to RM's unit having a "veranda terrace" and better location with ideal views.

The clip begins with one female speaker transitioning into a description of a new building. She describes its location and design as modern. She mentions a study room or office, along with a kitchen. She then transitions into the topic of gardens and dining areas in the building. Music plays lightly underneath the speaker's voice, providing a bright and upbeat mood.

The clip starts with a female narrator describing BTS's living situation upgrade in 2017, noting the location's luxury and popularity with actors and executives. She details the size, features, and cost of their shared unit, emphasizing the multiple bedrooms, bathrooms, and especially the two kitchens. She adopts a light and descriptive tone, emphasizing the group's enjoyment of communal spaces. Light music plays in the background throughout.

The audio clip begins with a speaker, who is identified as female, stating, "BTS chose this building for the top of the line amenities". She describes the properties as having villas with tight security, gardens and city views. She emphasizes the building's near impossibility to break into and its high-end amenities. The speaker transitions to briefly reviewing the individual properties. A backing music plays throughout the clip.

The clip features a single female speaker describing the real estate investments of a BTS member, mentioning the "Trimage apartment complex" and its amenities. Her tone is informative and enthusiastic. The clip lacks any music or background sounds.

The clip features a single female speaker relaying information about Jin purchasing a unit at the Hill complex for his parents as a gift, worth $3.4 million. She mentions that he previously purchased another apartment in the building for himself. Subsequently, she reports that RM acquired a $4 million apartment in the Hill as well, spanning over 3,000 square feet. The speaker maintains a neutral, informative tone throughout.

The audio clip begins with a woman speaking in an informative tone, describing real estate purchases of members in a group, mentioning "Shuga" moving "a bit further away from the hill purchasing an apartment unit in UN village for 3 million dollars," and another member "V" buying in Gangnam. This part discusses an "Afflebaum apartment unit," noting "tight security" and a value of "4.55 million dollars."

The clip begins with an upbeat, catchy pop song playing. The music then fades out as a female speaker starts talking in an informative tone. She discusses the youngest member of BTS, Jungkook, purchasing a property, mentioning its features and cost. She continues to discuss real estate investments of other members, including Jimin, who bought an old complex to restore and sell it.

The audio clip begins with a female speaker discussing the homes of BTS members, mentioning "RM and Jimin's brand new luxury apartment purchases" and "Hannam the Hill." The speaker invites listeners to share their thoughts on living arrangements and which member made the best property investment, then asks for comments. The speaker continues thanking the audience, encouraging them to follow her on Instagram, and ends the speech with a simple "Bye." Then upbeat dance music begins, creating an energetic, almost celebratory mood.
